## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested my changes on multiple Python versions (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README, docs/, etc.)
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new/modified functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md file
- [ ] I have added examples for new features (if applicable)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not introduced new dependencies, or I have discussed them in the issue
- [ ] I have updated requirements files if dependencies changed
